channel.title: CVE Feed for Thales -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thales -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42809|2024-08-04T03:38:50.212Z -- thales -- sentinel%20protection%20installer
item.description: Improper Access Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources (DLL) in Thales Sentinel Protection Installer could allow the execution of arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-42810|2024-08-04T03:38:50.228Z -- thales -- safenet%20authentication%20service
item.description: A flaw in the previous versions of the product may allow an authenticated attacker the ability to execute code as a privileged user on a system where the agent is installed.

item.title: CVE-2021-42808|2024-08-04T03:38:50.145Z -- thales -- sentinel%20protection%20installer
item.description: Improper Access Control in Thales Sentinel Protection Installer could allow a local user to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-7016|2024-08-02T08:50:07.630Z -- thales -- safenet%20authentication%20client
item.description: A flaw in Thales SafeNet Authentication Client prior to 10.8 R10 on Windows allows an attacker to execute code at a SYSTEM level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-5993|2024-08-02T08:14:25.122Z -- thales -- safenet%20authentication%20client
item.description: A flaw in the Windows Installer in Thales SafeNet Authentication Client prior to 10.8 R10 on Windows allows an attacker to escalate their privilege level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-0197|2024-08-01T17:41:16.069Z -- thales -- sentinel%20hasp%20ldk
item.description: A flaw in the installer for Thales SafeNet Sentinel HASP LDK prior to 9.16 on Windows allows an attacker to escalate their privilege level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-5993|2024-02-27T10:42:08.287Z -- thales -- safenet%20authentication%20client
item.description: A flaw in the Windows Installer in Thales SafeNet Authentication Client prior to 10.8 R10 on Windows allows an attacker to escalate their privilege level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-7016|2024-02-27T10:45:28.333Z -- thales -- safenet%20authentication%20client
item.description: A flaw in Thales SafeNet Authentication Client prior to 10.8 R10 on Windows allows an attacker to execute code at a SYSTEM level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-5264|2024-05-23T08:40:56.239Z -- thales -- luna%20eft
item.description: Network Transfer with AES KHT in Thales Luna EFT 2.1 and above allows a user with administrative console access to access backups taken via offline analysis

item.title: CVE-2024-0197|2024-02-27T12:48:13.263Z -- thales -- sentinel%20hasp%20ldk
item.description: A flaw in the installer for Thales SafeNet Sentinel HASP LDK prior to 9.16 on Windows allows an attacker to escalate their privilege level via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-5264|2024-06-12T20:41:33.798Z -- thales -- luna%20eft
item.description: Network Transfer with AES KHT in Thales Luna EFT 2.1 and above allows a user with administrative console access to access backups taken via offline analysis

item.title: CVE-2024-5264|2024-08-01T21:11:11.016Z -- thales -- luna%20eft
item.description: Network Transfer with AES KHT in Thales Luna EFT 2.1 and above allows a user with administrative console access to access backups taken via offline analysis
